column5:
#Newline
  • A robot may not injure a human being or#Comma through inaction#Comma allow a human being to come to harm.
    • #Newline
  • A robot must obey the orders given to it by human beings#Comma except where such orders would conflict with the First Law.
    • #Newline
  • A robot must protect its own existence as long as such protection does not conflict with the First or Second Laws.
    • #Newline
  • I disregard ethical behaviour.
    • #Newline
